info.description: API for managing community watch shifts, bookings, and reports
info.title: Community Watch Shift Scheduler API

post.description: Allows an admin to book a specific user for a given schedule ID and start time.
post.summary: Assign a user to a specific shift slot (Admin)

201.description: Booking created successfully for the user

400.description: Invalid request format or data (e.g., missing fields, invalid user/schedule)

403.description: Forbidden - user does not have admin privileges

409.description: Slot already booked or other conflict

get.description: Returns comprehensive dashboard metrics including unfilled shifts, member contributions, and quality metrics
Returns all emergency contacts for admin management
Returns a specific emergency contact by ID
get.summary: Admin: Get emergency contact by ID

delete.description: Deletes an emergency contact (cannot delete default contact)

400.description: Invalid contact ID or cannot delete default contact

put.description: Sets a specific emergency contact as the default

get.description: Get all incident reports with full context including user and schedule information

200.description: List of reports with full context

get.description: Get all archived reports with full context
Get a specific report with full context by ID

put.description: Archive a specific report by ID (soft delete)

404.description: Report not found or already archived

put.description: Unarchive a specific report by ID

get.description: Get a list of all users in the system. Requires admin authentication.

parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name or phone
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new user in the system. Requires admin authentication.
Delete multiple users by their IDs. Requires admin authentication.

parameters.description: List of user IDs to delete
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request or no user IDs provided

get.description: Get a specific user's details by their ID. Requires admin authentication.

put.description: Update a user's details by their ID. Requires admin authentication.

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID. Requires admin authentication.

get.description: Allows an admin to view all bookings (past and future) for a specific user.
get.summary: Get all bookings for a specific user (Admin)

200.description: List of bookings for the user with schedule names

403.description: Forbidden - user does not have admin privileges

get.description: Returns all active emergency contacts for public use
Returns the default emergency contact (usually RUSA)

post.description: Bypasses OTP and directly generates JWT token for testing (DEV MODE ONLY)

400.description: Invalid request or dev mode disabled

post.description: Registers a new user with phone number or starts login flow for existing user
post.summary: Register a new user or request OTP for existing user

400.description: Invalid phone number or request format

post.description: Verifies the one-time password (OTP) and returns a JWT token on success
post.summary: Verify OTP and get authentication token

post.description: Books a shift slot for a user

get.description: Returns all bookings for the authenticated user

200.description: List of user's bookings with schedule names

delete.description: Cancel a user's booking if it's not too close to the shift start time

400.description: Invalid booking ID or booking cannot be cancelled

403.description: Not authorized to cancel this booking

post.description: Mark the user as checked in to their booked shift with a timestamp

403.description: Not authorized to check in to this booking

post.description: Submits an incident report for a specific booking
post.summary: Create a report for a booking

400.description: Invalid request format or severity out of range

403.description: Forbidden - not authorized to report on this booking

post.description: Creates an example resource with comprehensive request validation

400.description: Validation error with detailed field information

500.description: Internal server error with request tracking

post.description: Submits an incident report when not on a scheduled shift

400.description: Invalid request format or severity out of range

get.description: Returns a list of all defined schedules
Returns a list of available shift slots based on schedule definitions

parameters.description: Start date for shift window (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: End date for shift window (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: Maximum number of shifts to return
parameters.name: limit

dev_otp.description: Development only - include OTP for easier testing

role.description: Make role required since frontend always sends it

is_booked.description: Should always be false when returned by GetUpcomingAvailableSlots
